paragraphs.original: 话说众人见平儿来了，都说：“你们奶奶做什么呢？怎么不来了？”平儿笑道：“他那里得空儿来？因为说没得好生吃，又不得来，所以叫我来问还有没有，叫我再要几个拿了家去吃罢。”湘云道：“有，多著呢。”忙命人拿盒子装了十个极大的。平儿道：“多拿几个团脐的。”众人又拉平儿坐，平儿不肯。李纨瞅著他，笑道：“偏叫你坐！”因拉他身旁坐下，端了一杯酒，送到他嘴边。平儿忙喝了一口，就要走。李纨道：“偏不许你去！显见得你只有凤丫头，就不听我的话了。”说著，又命嬷嬷们：“先送了盒子去，就说我留下平儿了。”
paragraphs.english: And when they saw Ping'er arrive, they asked, "What's your mistress doing? Why don't she come herself?" Ping'er said, "She doesn't have any time to come. Because she said there was no good food, she couldn't come, so she sent me to see if there was anything else we can take home to eat." Huanqin said, "There is plenty, in fact, there's more than enough." She quickly asked the servants to put the dishes in a box and filled it with ten of the largest ones. Ping'er said, "Take some with the skin on, too." Everyone then invited Ping'er to sit down, but she refused. Li Wannian saw Ping'er and said, "You're the only one who can sit down." So she pulled her to sit next to her and handed her a cup of wine, which Ping'er quickly took a sip from and wanted to leave. Li Wannian said, "You're not allowed to leave yet! You only listen to Big Boss, but you don't listen to me." As she said that, she asked the old servants, "Take the box away first, and say that I have left Ping'er here."

paragraphs.original: 那婆子一时拿了盒子回来，说：“二奶奶说，叫奶奶和姑娘们别笑话要嘴吃。这个盒子里，方才舅太太那里送来的菱粉糕和鸡油卷儿，给奶奶姑娘们吃的。”又向平儿道：“说了：使唤你来，你就贪住嘴不去了，叫你少喝锺儿罢。”平儿笑道：“多喝了又把我怎么样？”一面说，一面只管喝，又吃螃蟹。李纨揽著他，笑道：“可惜这么个好体面模样儿，命却平常，只落得屋里使唤！不知道的人，谁不拿你当做奶奶太太看？”
paragraphs.english:
This old woman returned with the box and said, "Mam and Madam, do not ridicule us but eat now. There are these cakes of lotus-flower rice-flour and chicken-oil rolls, sent here just now from Madam Aunt, for you." She then said to Ping'er, "We've said it to you many times. Yet, you still want to eat more. What can I do to you? I can only ask you not to drink another glass of wine." Ping'er laughed, "What can you do to me even if I drink more?" As she spoke, she continued eating and drinking, and eating the crabs. Li Wanyan held her in her arms and laughed, "You are so beautiful, yet your fate is ordinary. You can only attend to the needs of the household. Outsiders do not know how you are regarded. Everyone regards you as a lady."

Ping'er said, "Even if I drink too much, what can you do to me?" She was still eating and drinking, and eating the crabs. Li Wanyan held her in her arms and laughed, "You are so beautiful, but you have a poor fate. You can only be in the kitchen. No one knows you, but everyone regards you as a lady."

paragraphs.original: 平儿一面和宝钗湘云等吃喝著，一面回头笑道：“奶奶，别这么摸的我怪痒痒的。”李氏道：“嗳哟！这硬的是什么？”平儿道：“是钥匙。”李氏道：“有什么要紧的东西怕人偷了去，这么带在身上？我成日家和人说：有个唐僧取经，就有个白马来驮著他；刘智远打天下，就有个瓜精来送盔甲；有个凤丫头，就有个你。你就是你奶奶的一把总钥匙，还要这钥匙做什么？”平儿笑道：“奶奶吃了酒，又拿我来打趣著取笑儿了。”
paragraphs.english:
As Ping'er was drinking with the others, she turned and smiled, "Grandmother, don't scratch at me as if you were itchy." Li said, "Eek! What's this hard thing?" Ping'er said, "It's a key." Li said, "What are you afraid of, to bring a key with you? I've always said that if there's a Tang monk journeying to the West, there's a white horse carrying him; if Liu Zhiran is building his kingdom, there's a worm carrying armor; and if there's a madam who's a phoenix, there's a servant girl who's a key. You're your grandmother's master key. Why do you need to bring a key with you?" Ping'er laughed, "Grandmother is drinking, and you're making fun of me."

李氏笑道：“你既是奶奶的总钥匙，还有什么钥匙带在身上？”平儿笑道：“奶奶既这么说，我这钥匙便交给你了。”说毕，便将钥匙递在李氏手内。李氏又命倒了两杯酒，笑道：“你喝了这两杯，我才放心。”平儿道：“奶奶别这么说，叫人听见了笑话。”李氏道：“你又不是我的女儿，你怕什么？”平儿笑道：“我虽不是奶奶的亲生女儿，幸而自幼奶了我一场，老太太、太太都是将我当女儿养的，所以我待奶奶也是女儿的心。虽然不敢十分当家，却也贴着小心。奶奶别叫人添了我的罪过就是了。” 李氏道：“你既这么说，我也不必推辞，且将这两杯喝了，咱们再喝三杯。”

Li smiled, "Since you're your grandmother's master key, you must have other keys on you?" Ping'er smiled, "Since grandmother puts it that way, then I will give you my key." She handed the key over to Li. Li then poured two more cups of wine and said, "Drink these two, and I'll be happy." Ping'er said, "Grandmother, don't say that. Others might think it strange." Li said, "You're not my daughter, so what do you have to be afraid of?" Ping'er laughed, "I may not be your biological daughter, but I was breastfed by you from a young age. The old lady and Mother are like my parents. I view grandmother as my daughter. I may not dare to be in charge, but I'll be careful. Just don't blame me for any wrongdoings, grandmother." Li said, "If you say so, I won't decline your offer. Drink these two, and let's have three more."

paragraphs.original: 宝钗笑道：“这倒是真话。我们没事评论起来，你们这几个，都是百个里头挑不出一个来的。妙在各人有各人的好处。”李纨道：“大小都有个天理。比如老太太屋里要没鸳鸯姑娘，如何使得？从太太起，那一个敢驳老太太的回？他现敢驳回，偏老太太只听他一个人的话。老太太的那些穿带的，别人不记得，他都记得，要不是他经管著，不知叫人诓骗了多少去呢！况且他心也公道，虽然这样，倒常替人上好话儿，还倒不倚势欺人的。”惜春笑道：“老太太昨日还说呢，他比我们还强呢！”平儿道：“那原是个好的，我们那里比得上他？”宝玉道：“太太屋里的彩霞，是个老实人。”探春道：“可不是老实？心里可有数儿呢。太太是那么佛爷似的，事情上不留心；他都知道，凡一应事，都是他提著太太行。连老爷在家出外去的一应大小事，他都知道，太太忘了，他背后告诉太太。”李纨道：“那也罢了。”指著宝玉道：“这一个小爷屋里，要不是袭人，你们度量到个什么田地？凤丫头就是个楚霸王，也得两只膀子好举千斤鼎；他不是这丫头，他就得这么周到了？”平儿道：“先时赔了四个丫头来，死的死，去的去，只剩下我一个孤鬼儿了。”李纨道：“你倒是有造化的，凤丫头也是有造化的。想当初你大爷在日，何曾也没两个人？你们看，我还是那容不下人的？天天只是他们不如意，所以你大爷一没了，我趁著年轻，都打发了。要是有一个好的守的住，我到底也有个膀臂了！”说著，不觉眼圈儿红了。众人都道：“这又何必伤心？不如散了倒好。”

平儿应声后，径直走出园门。只见凤姐那边派人来找她，说：“奶奶等着您呢。”平儿说：“怎么这么急？我正和奶奶说话，没躲起来，她们老是这么三番五次地找我！”丫头说：“又不是我想的主意，姑娘您自己去找奶奶吧！”

paragraphs.original: 平儿啐道：“好了，你们越发上脸了！”说著走来，只见凤姐儿不在屋里。忽见上回来打抽丰的刘姥姥和板儿来了，坐在那边屋里，还有张材家的周瑞家的陪著；又有两三个丫头，在地下倒口袋里的枣儿、倭瓜并些野菜。众人见他进来，都忙站起来。刘姥姥因上次来过，知道平儿的身分，忙跳下地来，问：“姑娘好？”又说：“家里都问好。早要来请姑奶奶的安，看姑娘来的，因为庄家忙。好容易今年多打了两石粮食，瓜果菜蔬也丰盛。这是头一起摘下来的，并没敢卖呢，留的尖儿，孝敬姑奶奶姑娘们尝尝。姑娘们天天山珍海味的，也吃腻了；吃个野菜儿，也算我们的穷心。”平儿忙道：“多谢费心！”又让坐。自己坐了，又让张婶子周大娘坐了，命小丫头子倒茶去。周瑞张材两家的因笑道：“姑娘今日脸上有些春色，眼圈儿都红了。”平儿笑道：“可不是？我原不喝，大奶奶和姑娘们只是拉著死灌，不得已，喝了两锺，脸就红了。”张材家的笑道：“我倒想著要喝呢，又没人让我，明日再有人请姑娘，可带了我去罢。”说著，大家都笑了。周瑞家的道：“早起我就看见那螃蟹了，一斤只好称两个，三个。这么两三大篓，想是有七八十斤呢。”张材家的道：“要是上上下下，只怕还不够。”平儿道：“那里都吃？不过都是有名儿的吃两个子。那些散众儿的，也有摸著的，也有摸不著的。”刘姥姥道：“这样螃蟹，今年就值五分一斤。十斤五钱。五五二两五，三五一十五，再搭上酒菜，一共倒有二十多两银子！阿弥陀佛！这一顿的银子，够我们庄家人过一年了！”
paragraphs.english: Ping’er spat and said, "You people have no shame!" She then walked over and found that the Countess was not in the room. She suddenly saw Liu姥姥 and Bander sitting inside the room, accompanied by Zhang Cai and Zhou Rui. She also saw a few girls dumping persimmons, Japanese gourds, and some wild vegetables from their pockets. When they saw her coming in, everyone hurriedly stood up. Liu姥姥, knowing Ping’er's status because she had been there before, quickly jumped down and said, "How are you, Miss?" Then she said, "Please convey our greetings to your grandmother and the ladies. We have been meaning to visit to pay our respects, but the farming was busy. This year, we harvested more grains, fruits, and vegetables. These are the first ones we picked, and we have not sold them yet. We saved them to offer to your grandmother and the ladies as a token of our respect. The ladies eat all kinds of delicacies every day, and maybe they would like to try some wild vegetables, too. We wanted to show our filial piety." Ping’er quickly replied, "Thank you for your kind wishes!" Then she asked them to sit down. She herself sat down and let Zhang Aunty and Zhou Madam sit down as well, and she sent the young servant girl to fetch tea. Zhou Rui and Zhang Cai laughed and said, "You look a bit flushed today, Miss, and your eyes are red." Ping’er laughed and said, "That's right? I do not usually drink, but the Countess and the ladies insisted, and I ended up drinking only a few cups, and my face turned red." Zhang Cai laughed and said, "I would like to drink too, but no one invited me. Next time you invite, please include me as well." Everyone laughed. Zhou Rui said, "I saw those crabs this morning. Only two crabs were weighed for a pound, and three for two pounds. These two baskets of crabs must weigh at least seventy to eighty pounds." Zhang Cai said, "It might not be enough if everyone eats." Ping’er said, "Everyone can eat them, but it's for those with a name and reputation to have two each. The rest can only get some if they try." Liu said, "These crabs this year cost five fen per catty. For ten catties, it would be five jiao five fen. Multiply that by five and five, it's two liang five fen. Three times five is fifteen. If we add the drinks and food, it's at least twenty liang silver! Ah弥陀佛! This meal's worth is enough to feed our farming family for a whole year!"
paragraphs.chinese: 平儿啐了一口，说道：“你们越发不知廉耻了！”说着，走过去，见凤姐不在屋子里。忽然看到上次来打秋风的刘姥姥和板儿坐在屋里，还有张材家的和周瑞家的陪着；又见有几个丫头倒着口袋里的枣儿、倭瓜和一些野菜。众人看到她进来，都忙站起来。刘姥姥因为上次来过，知道平儿的身份，急忙跳下地，说道：“姑娘好？”又说：“家里人都问候好。早想来看姑奶奶和姑娘们，请安，因为庄稼忙。今年多打了一些粮食，瓜果蔬菜也很丰富。这是头一次摘下来的，并没有卖掉，留着尖儿孝敬姑奶奶和姑娘们尝尝。姑娘们天天吃山珍海味，也吃腻了，吃个野菜也表示我们的孝心。”平儿忙道：“谢谢您的心意！”接着让刘姥姥他们坐下。自己坐下了，又让张婶子、周大娘坐下，让小丫头倒茶去。周瑞家的和张材家的笑道：“姑娘今天脸色有些红润，眼圈都红了。”平儿笑道：“可不是？我本来不喝酒的，但大奶奶和姑娘们硬要灌我，结果只喝了几杯，脸就红了。”张材家的笑道：“我倒想喝呢，可没人请我，下次请姑娘时，可带我一起去吧。”说着，大家都笑了。周瑞家的说道：“早起我就看见那螃蟹了，一斤只称两个，三个。这两大篓螃蟹，至少有七八十斤。”张材家的道：“要是上上下下都吃，只怕不够。”平儿道：“哪儿都吃得了？不过是大家有名的人吃两个。那些散众，有些摸得到，有些摸不到。”刘姥姥道：“这样的螃蟹，今年五分一斤。十斤五钱。五五二两五，三五一十五，再加上酒菜，一共得二十多两银子！阿弥陀佛！一顿饭的钱，够我们庄稼人过一年了！”

paragraphs.original: 平儿因问：“想是见过奶奶了？”刘姥姥道：“见过了，叫我们等著呢。”说著，又往窗外看天气，说著：“天好早晚了，我们也去罢。别出不去城，才是讥荒呢。”周瑞家的道：“等著我替你瞧瞧去。”说著，一径去了，半日方来，笑道：“可是姥姥的福来了，竟投了这两个人的缘了！”平儿等问怎么样。周瑞家的笑道：“二奶奶在老太太跟前呢。我原是悄悄的告诉二奶奶：‘刘姥姥要家去呢，怕晚了赶不出城去。’二奶奶说：‘大远的，难为他扛了些东西来。晚了，就住一夜，明日再去。’这可不是投上二奶奶的缘了吗？－－这也罢了，偏老太太又听见了，问刘姥姥是谁。二奶奶就回明白了。老太太又说：‘我正想个积古的老人家说话儿，请了来我见见。’这可不是想不到的投上缘了？”说著，催刘姥姥下来前去。
paragraphs.english: Peng Er asked Liu Laolao, "Have you met the mistress?" Liu Laolao replied, "I have, and now I am waiting for her." Looking up at the sky, she continued, "The sky is so late, we should be leaving now. If we don't get out of the city, it would be ridiculous." Zhou Rui's lady-in-waiting said, "Let me go first to check." She then went off and came back shortly after, laughing and saying, "Liu Laolao is blessed, she has a connection with Madam!" Everyone asked what had happened, and Zhou Rui's lady-in-waiting replied, "Madam is currently in front of the old lady. I secretly told Madam about Liu Laolao's desire to go home, fearing that it would be too late to leave the city. Madam said, 'She has traveled such a long way with all those things. Let her stay with us tonight and leave tomorrow.' Isn't this a blessing? Moreover, when I mentioned Liu Laolao to the old lady, she asked who she was. Madam then told the old lady about Liu Laolao. The old lady said, 'I was just thinking of meeting an old relic and now I have invited Liu Laolao.' Isn't this wishing for a connection and she has received it?" She then urged Liu Laolao to quickly go and meet the old lady.
paragraphs.chinese: 平儿问刘姥姥：“是不是见了奶奶？”刘姥姥说：“见了，现在让我等着。”说着往外看天，又说：“天都这么晚了，我们该走了吧，要是出不去城，那就是荒唐了。”周瑞家的说：“让我先去看看。”说着就去了，一会回来笑着说：“刘姥姥有福，投上了二奶奶的缘分了！”平儿等人问怎么样，周瑞家的说：“二奶奶正在老太太面前呢。我悄悄的跟二奶奶说了刘姥姥要回家，怕天晚了赶不出城。二奶奶说：“大老远的，刘姥姥扛了这么多东西，晚上就住在我们这，明天再走。’这不是投上了二奶奶的缘分了吗？再说，老太太听我提刘姥姥，又问她是谁。二奶奶就告诉了老太太。老太太说：“我正想见见一个老古董，就把刘姥姥请来了。’这不是想投上缘分都投上了吗？”说着催着刘姥姥快去见老太太。

paragraphs.original: 刘姥姥道：“我这生像儿，怎么见得呢？好嫂子！你就说我去了罢！”平儿忙道：“你快去罢，不相干的。我们老太太最是惜老怜贫的，比不得那个狂三诈四的那些人。想是你怯上，我和周大娘送你去。”说著，同周瑞家的带了刘姥姥往贾母这边来。二门口该班的小厮们见了平儿出来，都站起来，有两个又跑上来，赶著平儿叫“姑娘”。平儿问道：“又说什么？”那小厮笑道：“这会子也好早晚了，我妈病著，等我去请大夫。好姑娘！我讨半日假，可使得？”平儿道：“你们倒好，都商量定了，一天一个告假，又不回奶奶，只和我胡缠。前日住儿去了，二爷偏叫他叫不著，我应起来了，还说我做了情了。你今日又来了！”周瑞家的道：“当真的他妈病了，姑娘也替他应著，放了他罢。”平儿道：“明日一早来，听著，我还要使你呢。再睡的日头晒著屁股再来！你这一去，带个信儿给旺儿，就说奶奶的话，问他那剩的利钱，明日要还不交来，奶奶不要了，索性送他使罢。”那小厮欢天喜地，答应去了。
paragraphs.english: Lady Liu said, "What will I look like in front of Grandma? Good wife, just tell her that I am gone." Ping'er hurried to say, "Hurry, there's nothing to worry about. Our old grandma is the kindest to the elderly and poor. Unlike those pretentious people. Are you scared of our grandma? I'll send Madam Zhou with you." They started walking to the Grandma's residence, accompanied by Madam Zhou. The boys outside the gates, seeing Ping'er come out, stood up and called out "Miss". Ping'er asked, "What now?" One of the boys laughed and said, "It's almost dark. My mom is sick and I came to ask for a doctor. Pretty Miss, can I have a half-day off?" Ping'er replied, "You guys are so clever, each one of you asks for a day off and never tells grandma. You've been bothering me! You yesterday and now you today!" Madam Zhou said, "It's true that my mother is sick, Miss, please help me and let him go." Ping'er said, "Come tomorrow early. Did you hear? I still need you. Don't come to see the sun on your backside again! Go and tell Wang'er for me to pass on Grandma's words, and tell him to collect the rest of the interest. If he doesn't pay tomorrow, Grandma won't want it anymore, so let him use it." The boy was overjoyed and happily left.
paragraphs.chinese: 刘姥姥说：“我这模样，怎么见老太太呢？好嫂子，你就说我走了吧。”平儿忙说：“你快走吧，没事的。我们老太太最是怜惜老人和穷人了，不像那些虚情假意的人。你是不是害怕老太太呀？我和周大娘送你去吧。”说着，就和周瑞家的带着刘姥姥往贾母那里去。大门口的那些小厮们见平儿出来，都站起来，有两个跑上来叫“姑娘”。平儿问：“又怎么了？”那小厮笑着说：“现在也差不多天黑了，我妈妈病了，让我去请医生。好姑娘，我请半天假，行吗？”平儿说：“你们倒好，商量好了，一天一个人请假，又不告诉奶奶，只缠着我。前天住儿请假了，二爷偏叫他叫不到，我就应下来了，还说我偏心。你今天又来了！”周瑞家的说：“是真的妈妈病了，姑娘也替他应一下，让他走吧。”平儿说：“你明天一大早就来，听见了？我还要用你呢。再睡太阳晒屁股再来！你去吧，带个话给旺儿，告诉他奶奶的话，让他把剩下的利息收回来，明天要还不给他，奶奶不要了，就送给他用吧。”那小厮喜出望外，高兴地答应去了。

paragraphs.original: 平儿等来至贾母房中，彼时大观园中姐妹们都在贾母前承奉。刘姥姥进去，只见满屋里珠围翠绕，花枝招展的，并不知都系何人。只见一张榻上独歪著一位老婆婆，身后坐著一个纱罗裹的美人一般的个丫鬟在那里捶腿，凤姐儿站著正说笑。刘姥姥便知是贾母了，忙上来陪著笑，拜了几拜，口里说：“请老寿星安。”贾母也忙欠身问好，又命周瑞家的端过椅子来坐著。那板儿仍是怯人，不知问候。
paragraphs.english: Pin'er and the others arrived at Grandma Jia's quarters, where the young ladies of the Garden of Clear and Silent Views were paying respects to her. When Ruan Nai entered, she saw a number of ladies encircling the room, all bedecked in jewelry and trimmed in fine materials, each of them dazzling in her own way. Ruan Nai did not recognize any of them. She saw an old woman sitting on a couch, with a maid as lovely as a beauty massaging her legs. Standing on one side, the Countess Feng was chatting. Ruan Nai knew that she was Grandma Jia, and she quickly smiled and bowed, saying, "Please be well, Longevity Fairy." Grandma Jia hurriedly rose to return the greeting, and told Zhou Rui's wife to bring a chair for her. Bao'er was still afraid of people and did not dare to greet them.
paragraphs.chinese: 平儿等人来到贾母房中，这时大观园里的姑娘们都在向贾母请安。刘姥姥进去，见屋里围着许多珠光宝气的女子，满眼花枝招展，不知道都是谁。只见榻上坐着一位老婆婆，身后有一个像美人一样的丫鬟正在替她捶腿，凤姐站在一边说笑。刘姥姥知道那是贾母，忙笑着上去拜了几拜，嘴里说着“请老寿星安”。贾母也忙欠身回礼，并让周瑞家的给她搬来椅子坐下。板儿还是怕人，不敢问候。

paragraphs.original: 贾母道：“老亲家，你今年多大年纪了？”刘姥姥忙起身答道：“我今年七十五了。”贾母向众人道：“这么大年纪了，还这么硬朗！比我大好几岁呢！我要到这个年纪，还不知怎么动不得呢！”刘姥姥笑道：“我们生来是受苦的人，老太太生来是享福的。我们要也这么著，那些庄家活也没人做了。”贾母道：“眼睛牙齿还好？”刘姥姥道：“还都好，就是今年左边的槽牙活动了。”贾母道：“我老了，都不中用了，眼也花，耳也聋，记性也没了。你们这些老亲戚，我都记不得了。亲戚们来了，我怕人笑话，我都不会。不过嚼的动的吃两口，睡一觉，闷了时，和这些孙子孙女儿玩笑会子就完了。”刘姥姥笑道：“这正是老太太的福了。我们想这么著不能。”贾母道：“什么福？不过是老废物罢咧！”说的大家都笑了。
paragraphs.english: Jia Mu asked, "Old relative, how old are you this year?" Liu Fa-er hurriedly stood up and replied, "I'm seventy-five years old this year." Jia Mu spoke to the crowd, "So old and still so vigorous! You're several years older than me! I don't know if I would be able to move around like this if I were that age!" Liu Fa-er laughed and said, "We were born to suffer, but your grace was born to enjoy. If we were all like this, no one would do any farming work." Jia Mu asked, "How are your eyes and teeth?" Liu Fa-er replied, "They're all fine, but my left molar is loose." Jia Mu said, "I'm old and I'm useless. My eyesight is blurred, my hearing is gone, and my memory has faded. I can't even remember my own relatives. When there are visitors, I'm afraid they'll laugh at me, so I don't know what to do. I just eat what I can chew and take a nap, and when I'm bored, I play around with my grandsons and granddaughters." Liu Fa-er laughed and said, "That's your good luck. We can't even do that." Jia Mu said, "What good luck? It's just old age and uselessness!" Everyone laughed at her remark.
paragraphs.chinese: 贾母问：“老亲家，你今年多大岁数了？”刘姥姥忙站起身，回答：“我今年七十五岁了。”贾母对众人都说：“这么大岁数了，还这么硬朗！比我大好几岁呢！我要是到这么岁数，还不知怎么行动不得呢！”刘姥姥笑着说：“我们生来是受苦的人，老太太生来是享福的。我们要是也这样，那些农活就没人做了。”贾母问：“眼睛、牙齿都还好吗？”刘姥姥回答：“都还好，只是左边的槽牙动了。”贾母说：“我老了，都不中用了，眼睛花，耳朵聋，记性也没了。你们这些老亲戚，我都记不住了。来了亲戚，我怕人笑话，我都不大会。不过是嚼得动的吃两口，睡一觉，闷了时，和这些孙子孙女儿们打趣逗乐，就完了。”刘姥姥笑着说：“这正是老太太的福气呢。我们想这样都不行。”贾母说：“什么福？不过是老废物罢了！”说的大家都笑了。

paragraphs.original: 贾母又笑道：“我才听见凤哥儿说，你带了好些瓜菜来，我叫他快收拾去了。我正想个地里现结的瓜儿菜儿吃，外头买的不像你们地里的好吃。”刘姥姥笑道：“这是野意儿，不过吃个新鲜；依我们倒想鱼肉吃，只是吃不起。”贾母又道：“今日既认著了亲，别空空的就去；不嫌我这里，就住一两天再去。我们也有个园子，园子里头也有果子，你明日也尝尝，带些家去，也算是看亲戚一趟。”凤姐儿见贾母喜欢，也忙留道：“我们这里虽不比你们的场院大，空屋子还有两间。你住两天，把你们那里的新闻故事儿说些给我们老太太听听。”贾母笑道：“凤丫头，别拿他取笑儿。他是屯里人，老实，那里搁的住你打趣？”说著，又命人去先抓果子给板儿吃。板儿见人多了，又不敢吃。贾母又命拿些钱给他，叫小么儿们带他外头顽去。刘姥姥吃了茶，便把些乡村中所见所闻的事情说给贾母听，贾母越发得了趣味。
paragraphs.english:
Translation:

The Old Lady Jia laughed and said, "I just heard from Fengqie that you brought some melons and vegetables with you. You should quickly prepare them. I'm in the mood for fresh produce; those bought from outside don't taste as good as those from our farm." Aunt Liu laughed, saying, "These are wild vegetables, meant for a change of taste; we wish we could afford fish and meat, but we can't." The Old Lady Jia continued, "Since you're family now, you don't have to rush back; stay for a couple of days. We have a small garden with some fruits, you can try them tomorrow and take some home as a visit to relatives." Seeing that the Old Lady Jia was pleased, Fengqie hurried to invite Aunt Liu, saying, "Our place isn't as big as your garden, but there are two empty rooms, you can stay for two days, and tell us some interesting things from your countryside." The Old Lady Jia laughed, "Fengqie, don't tease him; he's a countryman, he can't take your jests." Then, she ordered someone to give some fruits to Baoren, who was hesitant to eat in front of so many people. She ordered someone to give Baoren some money so he could go out and play with the other children. After drinking tea, Aunt Liu began to share some rural stories, which amused the Old Lady Jia very much.
paragraphs.chinese: 贾母又笑道：“我刚才听见凤姐儿说你带了些瓜菜来，要快去收拾起来。我正想吃新鲜瓜菜，外边买的不比你们地里种的好吃。"刘姥姥笑道："这是些野菜，只当个换口味；我们想吃鱼肉，只是吃不起。"贾母又说："既然成了亲戚，就不必急着回去，可以住一两天再走。我们也有个小花园，里面有些水果，你明天可以尝尝，带些回家，也算来看看亲戚。"凤姐见贾母高兴，也忙邀请刘姥姥说："我们这里虽然不像你们的院子大，但还有两间空屋，你可以住两天，跟我们说说你们乡下的新鲜事儿。"贾母笑道："凤姐，别拿他开玩笑了，他是乡下人，受不住你逗乐。"说罢，又命人给板儿拿些果子吃。板儿见人多，不敢吃，贾母又命人拿些钱给板儿，让他和小孩子们出去玩。刘姥姥喝了茶，开始说些乡下的见闻，让贾母觉得非常有趣。

paragraphs.original: 正说著，凤姐儿便命人请刘姥姥吃晚饭。贾母又将自己的菜拣了几样，命人送过去给刘姥姥吃。凤姐知道合了贾母的心，吃了饭，便又打发过来。鸳鸯忙命老婆子带了刘姥姥去洗了澡，自己去挑了两件随常的衣裳，叫给刘姥姥换上。那刘姥姥那里见过这般行事？忙换了衣裳出来，坐在贾母榻前，又搜寻些话出来说。彼时宝玉姐妹们也都在这里坐著。他们何曾听见过这些话？自觉比那些瞽目先生说的书还好听。
paragraphs.english: She was saying this when Lady Feng called for a feast for Granny Liu. The old lady also ordered some dishes she enjoyed and had them brought over to Granny Liu. Seeing that she had pleased the old lady, Lady Feng soon sent her back. Quanyang hurriedly arranged for the old lady to take a bath and fetched some clothes for her to change into. How could Granny Liu have seen such a scene before? After she was dressed, she sat before the old lady, racking her brains for something to say. At that moment, the boys and girls were also sitting there. They had never heard such stories, and found them more interesting than the nonsense that the blind fortune-tellers had been spouting.
paragraphs.chinese: 正在说着，凤姐便叫人请刘姥姥吃饭，贾母又把自己喜欢的菜肴挑出来，命人送过去让刘姥姥吃。凤姐看合了贾母的心，吃完饭，就叫人送她回去。鸳鸯忙让老婆子带刘姥姥去洗澡，自己去挑了两件常穿的衣服让刘姥姥换上。刘姥姥哪里见过这种阵势，换好衣服出来，坐在贾母榻前，搜肠刮肚的找话讲。当时宝玉姐妹们也在那里坐着。他们从未听过这些话，觉得比那些瞎眼先生讲的书还好听。

paragraphs.original: 那刘姥姥虽是个村野人，却生来的有些见识。况且年纪老了，世情上经历过的，见头一件贾母高兴，第二件这些哥儿姐儿都爱听，便没话也编出些话来讲。因说道：“我们村庄上，种地种菜，每年每日，春夏秋冬，风里雨里，那里有个坐著的空儿？天天都是在那地头上做歇马凉亭，什么奇奇怪怪的事不见呢？就像旧年冬天，接连下了几天雪，地下压了三四尺深，我那日起的早，还没出屋门，只听外头柴草响。我想著必定有人偷柴草来了。我巴著窗户眼儿一瞧，不是我们村庄上的人。”贾母道：“必定是过路的客人们冷了，见现成的柴火，抽些烤火，也是有的。”刘姥姥笑道：“也并不是客人，所以说来奇怪。老寿星打量什么人？原来是一个十七八岁极标致的个小姑娘儿，梳著溜油儿光的头，穿著大红袄儿，白绫子裙儿。……”刚说到这里，忽听外面人吵嚷起来，又说：“不相干，别唬著老太太！”贾母等听了，忙问：“怎么了？”丫鬟回说：“南院子马棚里走了水了。不相干，已经救下去了。”贾母最胆小的，听了这话，忙起身扶了人出至廊上来瞧时，只见东南角上火光犹亮。贾母唬得口内念佛，又忙命人去火神跟前烧香。王夫人等也忙都过来请安，回说：“已经救下去了，老太太请进去罢。”
paragraphs.english: The Lady Liu was a countrywoman, but she was a perceptive soul, and since she was old she had known much of the ways of the world. So, whether these two things were a delight to the Old Dowager, or whether they were the sort of stories that all the youngsters loved to hear, she did have something to say. So she told about the farming and gardening in her village. In every season, all year round, in the rain or the snow, with no place to sit down? Each day they built pavilions on the farm for a place to rest their horses, and what kinds of strange things did they not see? For example, the previous winter, for several days in a row, there had been snow down to the depth of three or four feet in the ground. On one morning, I had woken up early and was still in my bedroom when I heard the sound of rustling in the straw. I thought that there must be someone stealing firewood. I pressed my face to the window, but it was not someone from our village. The Old Dowager said, "It must have been a guest who was cold and saw our firewood and decided to use it." The Lady Liu laughed and said, "It wasn't actually a guest. It's really strange. Old Lady, who do you think it was? It was a seventeen or eighteen-year-old girl, so beautiful, her hair was oiled and shiny and she was wearing a red dress and a white skirt. . . ." She was just about to continue when suddenly she heard a commotion outside and someone crying, "Don't worry, don't frighten the Old Dowager!" The Old Dowager and the others quickly asked, "What happened?" The maid said, "The stable in the south-eastern corner caught on fire. But it's all right, they've already put it out." The Old Dowager was the most timid of the lot, so she got up at once and asked someone to fetch her to the veranda. She could still see the glow of the fire in the southeast corner. The Old Dowager was so frightened that she kept muttering the Buddhist mantra. She then quickly asked someone to light a stick of incense at the fire god. The Lady Wang and the others all hurried to the Old Dowager's side to offer their respects, telling her that the fire had been put out already, and that she should come back into the house.
paragraphs.chinese: 那刘姥姥是个乡下人，却有些见识，再加上年纪大了，对世态人情有种种经历，见这两件事情，一是贾母高兴，二是这些哥儿姐儿都爱听，便没话也编出些话来讲。于是说起了他们村庄上种地种菜的事情，每年每日，春夏秋冬，风里雨里，哪里有坐着的空儿？天天都是在那地头上做歇马凉亭，什么奇奇怪怪的事不见呢？就像旧年冬天，接连下了几天雪，地下压了三四尺深，我那日起的早，还没出屋门，只听外头柴草响。我想著必定有人偷柴草来了。我巴著窗户眼儿一瞧，不是我们村庄上的人。贾母道：“必定是过路的客人们冷了，见现成的柴火，抽些烤火，也是有的。”刘姥姥笑道：“也并不是客人，所以说来奇怪。老寿星打量什么人？原来是一个十七八岁极标致的个小姑娘儿，梳著溜油儿光的头，穿著大红袄儿，白绫子裙儿。……”刚说到这里，忽听外面人吵嚷起来，又说：“不相干，别唬著老太太！”贾母等听了，忙问：“怎么了？”丫鬟回说：“南院子马棚里走了水了。不相干，已经救下去了。”贾母最胆小的，听了这话，忙起身扶了人出至廊上来瞧时，只见东南角上火光犹亮。贾母唬得口内念佛，又忙命人去火神跟前烧香。王夫人等也忙都过来请安，回说：“已经救下去了，老太太请进去罢。

paragraphs.original: 贾母足足的看著火光熄了，方领众人进来。宝玉且忙问刘姥姥：“那女孩儿大雪地里做什么抽柴火？倘或冻出病来呢？”贾母道：“都是才说抽柴火，惹出事来了，你还问呢。别说这个了，说别的罢。”宝玉听说，心内虽不乐，也只得罢了。
paragraphs.english: Jia Mu watched the fire die down before leading the group outside. When asked by Bingyu, who had been alarmed by the mention of firewood, about the girl risking her health in the snow to gather firewood, she replied, "Don't blame me for talking about firewood that started a problem. Let's talk about something else." Bingyu was displeased, but he kept his feelings to himself.
paragraphs.chinese: 贾母一直看着火灭了，才领着众人出来。宝玉忙问刘姥姥那女孩在大雪天里抽柴火干什么？万一冻出病来怎么办？贾母道：都怪刚说抽柴火惹出事来了，你别问了。别提这个了，说点别的吧。宝玉心里不高兴，但还是忍着没说。

paragraphs.original: 刘姥姥便又想了想，说道：“我们庄子东边庄上有个老奶奶子，今年九十多岁了。他天天吃斋念佛，谁知就感动了观音菩萨，夜里来托梦，说：‘你这么虔心，原本你该绝后的，如今奏了玉皇，给你个孙子。’原来这老奶奶只有一个儿子，这儿子也只一个儿子，好容易养到十七八岁上死了，哭的什么儿似的；后起间真又养了一个，今年才十三四岁，长得粉团儿似的，聪明伶俐的了不得呢。这些神佛是有的不是？”
paragraphs.english: Lao Fu thought for a moment and said, "There’s an old lady in our village who lives to ninety-three. She prays every day. For some reason, she moved the Bodhisattva Guanyin to tears. She came to her in a dream at night and said, ‘You’re so sincere in your devotion. I should have you have no children, but I’ve asked Jade Emperor to let you have a grandson.’ She had only one son who had one son. She had to struggle hard to raise this last son until he was in his late teens. He died, and she grieved as if she had lost her only son. Then she managed to have another one, who is now thirteen or fourteen years old. He is healthy, plump, and very intelligent. Do gods and buddhas really exist?"
paragraphs.chinese: 刘姥姥想了想，说：“我们村东边有一个老奶奶，九十多岁了。她天天念经念佛，不知为什么，感动了观音菩萨。夜里来托梦说：‘你这么虔心，原本你该绝后的，如今奏了玉皇，让你有孙子。’原来，她只有一个儿子，这儿子只有一个儿子。好不容易养到十七八岁死了，她哭得像失去儿子一样。后来又养了一个，今年十三四岁，长得白白胖胖，聪明伶俐得很。神佛真的存在吗？”

paragraphs.original: 这一席话暗合了贾母王夫人的心事，连王夫人也都听住了。宝玉心中只惦记著抽柴的故事，因闷的心中筹画。探春因问他：“昨日扰了史大妹妹，偺们回去商议著邀一社，又还了席，也请老太太赏菊，何如？”宝玉笑道：“老太太说了，还要摆酒还史妹妹的席，叫偺们做陪呢。等吃了老太太的，偺们再请不迟。”探春道：“越往前越冷了，老太太未必高兴。”宝玉道：“老太太又喜欢下雨下雪的，偺们等下头场雪请老太太赏雪，不好吗？偺们雪下吟诗，也更有趣了。”黛玉笑道：“偺们雪下吟诗？依我说，还不如弄一捆柴火，雪下抽柴，还更有趣儿呢。”说著，宝钗等都笑了。宝玉瞅了他一眼，也不答话。一时散了，背地里宝玉到底拉了刘姥姥细问那女孩儿是谁。刘姥姥只得编了告诉他：“那原是我们庄子北沿儿地埂子上有个小祠堂儿，供的不是神佛。当先有个什么老爷－－”说著，又想名姓。宝玉道：“不拘什么名姓，也不必想了，只说原故就是了。”刘姥姥道：“这老爷没有儿子，只有一位小姐，名字叫什么若玉，知书儿识字的，老爷太太爱的像珍珠儿。可惜了儿的！这小姐儿长到十七岁了，一病就病死了。”宝玉听了，跌足叹惜，又问：“后来怎么样？”刘姥姥道：“因为老爷太太痛的心肝儿似的，盖了那祠堂，塑了个像儿，派了人烧香儿拨火的。如今年深日久了，人也没了，庙也烂了，那泥胎儿可就成了精咧。”宝玉忙道：“不是成精，规矩这样人是不死的。”刘姥姥道：“阿弥陀佛！是这么著吗？不是哥儿说，我们还当他成了精了呢。他时常变了人出来闲逛，我才说抽柴火的就是他了。我们村庄上的人商量著还要拿榔头砸他呢。”宝玉忙道：“快别如此！要平了庙，罪过不小！”刘姥姥道：“幸亏哥儿告诉我。明日回去，拦住他们就是了。”宝玉道：“我们老太太、太太都是善人，就是合家大小，也都好善喜舍，最爱修庙塑神的。我明日做一个疏头，替你化些布施，你就做香头，攒了钱，把这庙修盖，再装塑了泥像，每月给你香火钱烧香，好不好？”刘姥姥道：“若这样时，我托那小姐的福，也有几个钱使了。”
paragraphs.english: Lady Jia and Lady Wang were thinking of the things in his heart. Even Lady Wang was being captivated by him. All he was thinking of was the story of fetching wood. He was pondering over it and musing about it in his heart. He was musing and thinking endlessly but he could not recall anything. When asked by Chun, he replied, "Yesterday, I did not have a meal with my little sister. We had a meal together at our place. And now, we are going to repay the meal by having a meal for our elderly lady. We are not in a hurry." Chun answered, "It is getting colder. Our elderly lady may not be in the mood for it." When asked by Chun, he replied, "Our elderly lady likes to have rain or snow. Why don't we invite our elderly lady to have a snow day to appreciate the snow? It will be more interesting. We can compose poems under the snow." Jiu said, "We can compose poems under the snow? I think that instead of composing poems, we should fetch wood and dig in the snow for wood. It will be more interesting." After hearing her words, all of them laughed. Seeing that Jiu had not answered, he took a look at her but said nothing. After they dispersed, Jiu still asked Rulai who the girl was. Rulai only said that she was a lady with the surname Wang. She did not say the name of her. Jiu asked, "It doesn't matter. I don't need to know her name. Just tell me the story behind her is enough." Rulai said, "The elder gentleman does not have a son. He only has a daughter with the name Ruyu. She knows how to read and write. The elder gentleman and his wife treat her like a pearl. What a pity! This lady is 17 years old when she passed away." After hearing that, Jiu shook his feet in sadness and sighed. He then asked, "What happened after that?" Rulai said, "Because the elder gentleman and his wife was very sad, they built a shrine and a statue for her. They assigned people to burn incense and bring fire. After a long time, there are no people left. The temple is falling down. The clay statue has turned into a demon." Jiu quickly said, "It is not a demon, the rules say that people like that don't die." Rulai said, "Buddha, is that so? Thank you for telling me. The people of the village were planning to break the statue down." Jiu quickly said, "Don't do that! We will break down the temple and it will cause great sin." Rulai said, "Thank you for telling me. I will stop them when I go back." Jiu said, "Our elderly lady and our lady are all good people. The whole family is also fond of doing good deeds. I will ask someone to write a eulogy for you. We will donate some money to you. You can be in charge of the incense and collect money to repair the temple and the statue. Then, you can give incense every month. How about it?" Rulai said, "It is a great deal. I will thank the lady for her kindness."
paragraphs.chinese: 贾母和王夫人心里想的，宝哥哥也一清二楚，就连王夫人都听的着迷。宝玉一心想着抽柴的故事，心里老想着，闷闷的，在那里盘算，心里面想来想去，怎么也想不起来。探春就问他：“昨天没在你大妹妹那里吃饭，你们家凑一桌，又还了席，也请老太太赏菊花，怎么样？”宝玉笑道：“老太太说了，要再请大妹妹吃饭，叫我们陪陪她老人家。我们吃了老太太的饭，再请也不迟。”探春道：“越往前越冷了，老太太未必高兴。”宝玉道：“老太太又喜欢下雨下雪的，你们等下头场雪请老太太赏雪，不是更好吗？我们在雪下吟诗，也更有趣了。”黛玉笑道：“我们在雪下吟诗？依我说，还不如弄一捆柴火，雪下抽柴，还更有趣儿呢。”说着，宝钗等都笑了。宝玉瞅了他一眼，也不答话。后来他们散了，宝玉还是拉了刘姥姥问那女孩儿是谁。刘姥姥只说了一个“姓王”的，没说名，宝玉就打岔了，问道：“不用说了，不拘什么名姓，也不必想了，只说原故就是了。”刘姥姥道：“这老爷没有儿子，只有一位小姐，名字叫什么若玉，知书儿识字的，老爷太太爱的像珍珠儿。可惜了儿的！这小姐儿长到十七岁了，一病就病死了。”宝玉听了，跌足叹惜，又问：“后来怎么样？”刘姥姥道：“因为老爷太太痛的心肝儿似的，盖了那祠堂，塑了个像儿，派了人烧香儿拨火的。如今年深日久了，人也没了，庙也烂了，那泥胎儿可就成了精咧。”宝玉忙道：“不是成精，规矩这样人是不死的。”刘姥姥道：“阿弥陀佛！是这么著吗？不是哥儿说，我们还当他成了精了呢。他时常变了人出来闲逛，我才说抽柴火的就是他了。我们村庄上的人商量著还要拿榔头砸他呢。”宝玉忙道：“快别如此！要平了庙，罪过不小！”刘姥姥道：“幸亏哥儿告诉我。明日回去，拦住他们就是了。”宝玉道：“我们老太太、太太都是善人，就是合家大小，也都好善喜舍，最爱修庙塑神的。我明日做一个疏头，替你化些布施，你就做香头，攒了钱，把这庙修盖，再装塑了泥像，每月给你香火钱烧香，好不好？”刘姥姥道：“若这样时，我托那小姐的福，也有几个钱使了。”

paragraphs.original: 宝玉又问他地名庄名，来往远近，坐落何方，刘姥姥便顺口诌了出来。宝玉信以为真，回至房中，盘算了一夜。次日一早，便出来给了焙茗几百钱，按著刘姥姥说的方向地名，著焙茗去先踏看明白，回来再作主意。
paragraphs.english: 宝玉 then asked Old Lady Liu some place names, farm names, distances between places, and directions, and Old Lady Liu made up some. She convinced him. When he got back to his room, he thought about it for the whole night. The next morning, he gave Beimeng hundreds of coins and asked him to check out the directions Old Lady Liu had given him, and then come back and decide what to do.
paragraphs.chinese: 宝玉又问刘姥姥一些地名、庄名、路途远近、坐落方位。刘姥姥就即兴编造一些出来。宝玉信以为真。回房后，想了一夜。第二天早上，给了焙茗几百钱，按照刘姥姥说的方位，让焙茗先去走走，回来后再作打算。

paragraphs.original: 那焙茗去后，宝玉左等也不来，右等也不来，急的热地里的蚰蜒似的，好容易等到日落，方见焙茗兴兴头头的回来了。宝玉忙问：“可找著了？”焙茗笑道：“爷听的不明白，叫我好找！那地名坐落，不像爷听的一样，所以找了一天。找到东北角田埂子上，才有一个破庙。”宝玉听说，喜的眉开眼笑，忙说道：“刘姥姥有年纪的人，一时错记了，也是有的。你且说你见的。”焙茗道：“那庙门却倒也朝南开，也是稀破的。我找的正没好气，一见这个，我说：‘可好了！’连忙进去，一看泥胎，唬的我又跑出来了－－活像真的似的！”宝玉喜的笑道：“他能变化人了，自然有些生气！”焙茗拍手道：“那里是什么女孩儿！竟是一位青脸红发的瘟神爷！”宝玉听了，啐了一口，骂道：“真是个没用的杀材！这点子事也干不来！”焙茗道：“爷又不知看了什么书，或者听了谁的混账话，信真了，把这件没头脑的事派我去磕头，怎么说我没用呢？”宝玉见他急了，忙抚慰他道：“你别急，改日闲了，你再找去。要是他哄我们呢，自然没了；要竟是有的，你岂不也积了阴骘呢？我必重重的赏你。”说著，只见二门上的小厮来说：“老太太屋里的姑娘们站在二门口找二爷呢。”
